Package com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.payment.engine

Interface ContactlessPaymentServiceListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    PaymentServiceListener
    public interface ContactlessPaymentServiceListener
extends PaymentServiceListener
    Listener for the contactless payment transaction.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.payment.PaymentServiceListener

        TRANSACTION_CONTEXT_KEY

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void onFirstTapCompleted()
      Indicates that APDU processing of first tap has been completed.
      default void onNextTransactionReady​(DeactivationStatus deactivationStatus, DigitalizedCardStatus digitalizedCardStatus, DigitalizedCard digitalizedCard)
      It is called when payment service deactivation process is finish.
      void onReadyToTap​(PaymentService activatedPaymentService)
      Once the credentials (for CardHolder verification) has been successfully keyed in, the call-back shall indicate that the End User can now proceed to tap to the Terminal.
      void onTransactionCompleted​(TransactionContext ctx)
      It is called when transaction is completed.

      It is called when transaction is interrupted during transaction processing.
      void onTransactionStarted()
      Replaces onPaymentStarted().

      • Methods inherited from interface com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.payment.PaymentServiceListener

        onAuthenticationRequired, onError

    • Method Detail

      • onReadyToTap

        void onReadyToTap​(PaymentService activatedPaymentService)
        Once the credentials (for CardHolder verification) has been successfully keyed in, the call-back shall indicate that the End User can now proceed to tap to the Terminal.
        Parameters:
        activatedPaymentService - PaymentService

      • onTransactionCompleted

        void onTransactionCompleted​(TransactionContext ctx)
        It is called when transaction is completed. All the saved data for the transaction will be removed after this event.
        Parameters:
        ctx - TransactionContext

      • onTransactionStarted

        void onTransactionStarted()
        Replaces onPaymentStarted(). This callback represents a new transaction has been initiated upon previous deactivation. This is for the MPA to have state machine on its side when needed OR this is usefull for showing the user that a new payment is been initiated from this wallet.

      • onFirstTapCompleted

        void onFirstTapCompleted()
        Indicates that APDU processing of first tap has been completed. It is a trigger point for SDK init in case that a foreground service is not in use. Currently supported only for PFP based transactions. Please note for transactions completing in a single tap, onTransactionCompleted(TransactionContext) will be called directly. This method will not be called. *

      • onNextTransactionReady

        default void onNextTransactionReady​(DeactivationStatus deactivationStatus,
                                    DigitalizedCardStatus digitalizedCardStatus,
                                    DigitalizedCard digitalizedCard)
        It is called when payment service deactivation process is finish. Payment service deactivation process will be triggered after transaction is completed.
        Parameters:
        deactivationStatus - indicate the status of deactivation process DeactivationStatus
        digitalizedCardStatus - indicate the digital card state DigitalizedCardStatus
        digitalizedCard - indicate the digitalized card DigitalizedCard
        Since:
        6.4.0

      • onTransactionInterrupted

        default void onTransactionInterrupted​(int transactionInterruptedCode,
                                      java.lang.String transactionInterruptedMessage,
                                      int retryCount)
        It is called when transaction is interrupted during transaction processing. For example : Transaction is interrupted because NFC connection between SDK and POS has lost while the APDU exchange still ongoing.
        Parameters:
        transactionInterruptedCode - indicates transaction interrupted message code.
        transactionInterruptedMessage - indicates the details message of the transactionInterruptedCode.
        retryCount - indicates total retry count left
        Since:
        6.7.0
